settings.heading: Earn 10% OSEA Store Credit
settings.heading_classes: text-5xl font-serif tracking-tight pb-2  font-semibold text-white

settings.paragraph_text: Get 10% back on all U.S. orders when you pay with your preferred bank account using Catch. Plus, get a $10 bonus credit to use after your first order.

settings.heading_classes: text-center font-serif text-4xl md:text-5xl tracking-tight mb-2 md:mb-4 pt-10

settings.heading_classes: text-center font-serif text-4xl md:text-5xl tracking-tight mb-2 md:mb-4 pt-10

settings.paragraph_text: Still have questions? Click here to see full program terms & conditions.

What is Catch?
Catch is a free payment method that allows you to pay for online purchases directly from your bank account and earn credit to use at oseamalibu.com each time. You’ll only earn money, never pay money.
How do I sign up?
1. Select Catch at checkout. You’ll be redirected to Catch to log in or create an account. 2. To create an account, you’ll need to provide your phone number, name and email and link your bank account. Catch uses Plaid and Teller to link your bank in seconds—you’ve probably done this before if you have Venmo, Robinhood, or have filed your taxes online. 3. If you already have a Catch account, just verify your phone number and pay.
How do I redeem my credits?
Your credits will automatically be applied when you shop with us again and pay with Catch. You can also manage your credits at any time by logging into your Catch account.

If you’d like to share the love, simply select “share as gift” in your Catch account to gift your credit to a friend so they can use it towards something special at oseamalibu.com.
Are there any restrictions on my OSEA Catch credits?
Your OSEA Catch Credits can only be redeemed on US orders online at oseamalibu.com and must be used before they expire (OSEA Catch Credits expire 3 months from order date).

Gift card purchases and subscription orders are excluded from earning and redeeming OSEA Catch Credits.
What happens to my OSEA Catch credits if I return a purchase?
If you return part of your purchase, we will prorate the OSEA Catch Credits you earned for that purchase based on your new order total. If you return the full order, your OSEA Catch Credits will be voided.

In the event you've already redeemed the OSEA Catch Credits you earned on that purchase, your refund will be adjusted down by the amount of the OSEA Catch Credits redeemed. The same is true if you gifted the OSEA Catch Credits and they've already been claimed: your refund will be adjusted down by the amount of credits gifted.

settings.heading: About Catch
settings.heading_classes: font-serif text-4xl md:text-5xl tracking-tight mb-2 md:mb-4
settings.paragraph: Catch was founded in 2020 by some people in San Francisco who wondered why we all use credit and debit cards when there’s a better alternative for everyone (except the credit card companies and big banks). Our team hails from companies like Affirm, Google, Apple, and LinkedIn. Some of our biggest fans are OSEA Malibu (obviously) and the founders of Warby Parker, Allbirds, Harry’s, DoorDash and Casper. And now we hope to add you to that list!
